chapters.title: Chapter 19: Three Women
chapters.info: Marin al'Vere, p. 401 (461)—Egwene's mother. She is an important figure in the Women's Circle in Emond's Field; she is used to getting her way with other people. Mat recalls that she used to make very good pies, pies which he used to filch. See also al'Vere, Egwene.
